doc.previous: The term Semantic Web is often used more specifically to refer to the formats and technologies that enable it 2 The collection structuring and recovery of linked data are enabled by technologies that provide a formal description of concepts terms and relationships within a given knowledge domain These technologies are specified as W3C standards and include
doc.after: The Semantic Web Stack illustrates the architecture of the Semantic Web The functions and relationships of the components can be summarized as follows 15
